topic.title: Badges
topic.abstract: Documentation and examples for badges, our small count and labeling component.

section.title: Example
section.p: Badges scale to match the size of the immediate parent element by using relative font sizing and em units. As of v5, badges no longer have focus or hover styles for links.

section.title: Background colors
section.p: Use Bootstrap's background utility classes to quickly change the appearance of a badge. Please note that when using Bootstrap’s default .bg-light, you’ll likely need a text color utility like .text-dark for proper styling. This is because background utilities do not set anything but background-color.
